sentences.sContent: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.sCn: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.sContent: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.sCn: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.sContent: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.sCn: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

sentences.sContent: ...The American justice system is very complex and sometimes operates slowly...
...This shows that the relationship between hunger and food intake is more complex than we thought...
...This is a game in which you indicate with your finger the way through a complex system of passages or paths...
...have you inquired at the apartment complex down the street...

phrases.pCn: 复合结构；复结构；复数结构
金属络合物，金属络合盐；金属复合物
石油化工总厂；石油化工（总）公司
n. 复分析；复变分析；复变函数论
复平面；高斯平面；复变量平面

remMethod.val: com ＋ plex(重叠， 交叉) → 重叠交叉的 → 复合的； 复杂的

words.tran: 复杂，复杂性；复杂错综的事物

trans.tranOther: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand
